title: The Perfect Wumbo-Combo / Team Burst
body:
Malphite top,
Amumu jungle,
Sejuani Mid,
Leona Supp,
any adc with an aoe ult.
Thoughts?

replies.body: I play with my friend on teamspeak where he goes mid Pantheon and I play Sejuani jungle. Makes for good wombo combo times and having a panth in the mid lane means he can help me gank top or bot lane with ease.
I played a game before as fiddle support with kennan adc.... as soon as we went all in  with both our ults it was pretty epic

Yeah, I feel like Ori would be the prefect midlaner in this. You have 0 siege potential/poke otherwise. She is also way better with the burst than sejuani.

Mf, Lucian, Kalista, Varus would make good adc options :D
Don't you mean yasuo mid and mf adc?
